history.proof: intros ir1 ir2 H_eq o Hin. induction H_eq. - inversion Hin. - inversion Hin; subst; auto. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: in_eq. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: in_eq. - apply in_inv in Hin. destruct Hin as [Heq | [Hin | Hin]]. + subst. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: in_eq. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: in_eq. + apply in_cons. apply in_cons. sfirstorder depth: 3use: in_eq. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: in_eq.

ctx: intros ir1 ir2 H_eq o Hin.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros ir1 ir2 H_eq o Hin.
exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} y : IR xs, ys : list IR H_eq : IR_equivalent xs ys o : IR H : good_move o y IHH_eq : In o xs -> In o ys Unable to unify "y" with "o".

ctx: intros ir1 ir2 H_eq o Hin.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros ir1 ir2 H_eq o Hin.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros ir1 ir2 H_eq o Hin.
exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} x, y : IR xs, ys : list IR H_eq : IR_equivalent xs ys H : good_move x y o : IR Hin : In o xs IHH_eq : In o xs -> In o ys Unable to unify "In o xs" with "In o ys".

ctx: intros ir1 ir2 H_eq o Hin.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros ir1 ir2 H_eq o Hin. induction H_eq. - intros. inversion Hin. - intros. inversion Hin; subst; auto. - intros. apply in_inv in Hin. destruct Hin as [Heq | [Hin | Hin]]. + subst. apply in_eq. + apply in_cons. apply IHIR_equivalent with (o:=o) in Hin. apply Hin. + apply in_cons. apply in_cons. apply Hin. - intros. apply IHIR_equivalent1 with (o:=o) in Hin. apply IHIR_equivalent2 with (o:=o) in Hin. apply Hin.
